Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with high-quality materials. It comes with a range of features that we believe will enhance your daily experience. Considering its exceptional craftsmanship and functionality, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $200. This is an opportunity to own a piece that exceeds expectations and offers unparalleled value. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this exclusive deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
